metadata.title: CVE-2018-19857 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The CAF demuxer in modules/demux/caf.c in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.4 may read memory from an uninitialized pointer when processing magic cookies in CAF files, because a ReadKukiChunk() cast converts a return value to an unsigned int even if that value is negative. This could result in a denial of service and/or a potential infoleak.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.7.1-3').
